channel.title: Blog on Brian Greenwood
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Brian Greenwood

item.title: Where are NBA Champions drafted?
item.description: I recently logged on to my Kaggle profile for the first time in years and stumbled across a “dataset” I made in 2018. The dataset includes the top five players by playoff minutes from every NBA champion team from 2000 through 2019 and where each teamâ€™s top 5 players were selected in their respective drafts. Building a championship-winning team is a difficult task and I wanted to see what information could be gleaned by looking at the top of those rosters.

item.title: Liftoff
item.description: Hi and thanks for checking out my website. This blog will serve as an outlet to write about my interests and side projects. I suspect they will mostly be technical in nature and focus heavily on sports, but I’m sure other topics will surface as well. There isn’t much here now, but in the future, happy reading!
